issue.title: [Rust] Add support for array of List<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2374](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2374). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add support for List<T> in Array types. Look at Utf8 which wraps List<u8> to see how this works.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2374?focusedCommentId=16432219) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I am going to work on this next since we now have a ListBuilder<T> so it should be quick to implement.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2374?focusedCommentId=16457675) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
~~PR: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1958>~~

I have deleted the PR. This issue now depends on https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2521

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2374?focusedCommentId=16527786) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Was this actually fixed by ARROW-2521 or is there still work to do?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2374?focusedCommentId=16692160) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
`[~andygrove]` can this be closed?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2374?focusedCommentId=16709549) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I believe this can be closed. I will go ahead and close as duplicate.
